mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.guanghuilicheng_id as guanghuilichengId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.guanghuilicheng_liuyan_text as guanghuilichengLiuyanText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_name as guanghuilichengName ,guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_uuid_number as guanghuilichengUuidNumber ,guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_photo as guanghuilichengPhoto ,guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_types as guanghuilichengTypes ,guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_file as guanghuilichengFile ,guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_clicknum as guanghuilichengClicknum ,guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_content as guanghuilichengContent ,guanghuilicheng.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_delete as guanghuilichengDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM guanghuilicheng_liuyan a left JOIN guanghuilicheng guanghuilicheng ON a.guanghuilicheng_id = guanghuilicheng.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.guanghuilicheng_id = #{params.guanghuilichengId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.guanghuilicheng_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.guanghuilichengLiuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.guanghuilicheng_id IS NOT NULL
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.guanghuilichengName},'%')
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.guanghuilichengUuidNumber},'%')
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_types = #{params.guanghuilichengTypes}
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_clicknum >= #{params.guanghuilichengClicknumStart}
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_clicknum <= #{params.guanghuilichengClicknumEnd}
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_clicknum = #{params.guanghuilichengClicknum}
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.guanghuilichengContent},'%')
and guanghuilicheng.shangxia_types = #{params.shangxiaTypes}
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_delete >= #{params.guanghuilichengDeleteStart}
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_delete <= #{params.guanghuilichengDeleteEnd}
and guanghuilicheng.guanghuilicheng_delete = #{params.guanghuilichengDelete}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
